## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature or enhancement you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? Is your feature request related to a problem?

Example: "I'm always frustrated when [...]"

## Proposed Solution

Describe the solution you'd like. What would the ideal implementation look like?

## Alternatives Considered

Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Use Case

How would you use this feature? Provide specific examples.

Example:
1. When setting up a new Plex VM, I would...
2. This would allow me to...
3. The benefit would be...

## Documentation Impact

What documentation would need to be created or updated?

- [ ] README.md
- [ ] New guide in docs/
- [ ] Configuration examples
- [ ] Command reference
- [ ] Troubleshooting section
- [ ] Other: _______

## Target Section

Which section of the documentation should this be added to?

## Examples from Other Projects

Are there examples of this feature in other similar projects? (Links appreciated)

## Priority

How important is this feature to you?

- [ ] Critical - Needed to use the project
- [ ] High - Would significantly improve usability
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Minor improvement

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, diagrams, or examples about the feature request here.

## Willingness to Contribute

Are you willing to contribute this feature?

- [ ] Yes, I can submit a PR
- [ ] Yes, with guidance
- [ ] No, but I can help test
- [ ] No, just requesting
